definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Wang Xueming keen on the idea, so she came to Beijing to complete the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 王學明滿口答應，讓她來北京辦手續。

sentences.english: I readily promised, and say a person to walk not frightened.
sentences.chinese: 我滿口答應了，並說一個人走不害怕。

sentences.english: In agreeing so readily, he had an axe to grind.
sentences.chinese: 他滿口答應了這件事，是有他自己的算盤的。

sentences.english: To my surprise, he laughed and agreed.
sentences.chinese: 讓我沒想到的是，他笑了，並滿口答應。

sentences.english: Wang gave her a promise and then slept together with her.
sentences.chinese: 王生滿口答應，就和她同牀共枕。
